00019 template <typename Attribute>
00020 class TMultiAttributeMemberBase
00021 {
00022 public:
00023        typedef Attribute AttributeType;
00024        typedef typename Attribute::ValueType AttributeValueType;
00025        typedef void InterfaceType;
00026 
00027        TMultiAttributeMemberBase();
00028 
00036        void Init(const IComponent* ownerPtr, const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo);
00037 
00041        bool IsValid() const;
00042 
00046        int GetCount() const;
00047 
00051        const AttributeValueType& operator[](int index) const;
00052 
00053 protected:
00054        bool InitInternal(
00055                             const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00056                             const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00057                             const IComponent** definitionComponentPtr);
00058 
00059 
00060 private:
00061        const Attribute* m_attributePtr;
00062 };

00065 // public methods
00066 
00067 template <typename Attribute>
00068 TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::TMultiAttributeMemberBase()
00069 :      m_attributePtr(NULL)
00070 {
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 template <typename Attribute>
00075 void TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::Init(
00076                      const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00077                      const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo)
00078 {
00079        InitInternal(ownerPtr, staticInfo, NULL);
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 template <typename Attribute>
00084 bool TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::IsValid() const
00085 {
00086        return (m_attributePtr != NULL);
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 template <typename Attribute>
00091 int TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::GetCount() const
00092 {
00093        if (m_attributePtr != NULL){
00094               return m_attributePtr->GetValuesCount();
00095        }
00096        else{
00097               return 0;
00098        }
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 template <typename Attribute>
00103 const typename TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::AttributeValueType& TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::operator[](int index) const
00104 {
00105        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00106        Q_ASSERT(index < GetCount());
00107        Q_ASSERT(m_attributePtr != NULL);  // operator* was called for invalid object, or no IsValid() check was called.
00108        Q_ASSERT(m_attributePtr->GetValuesCount() == GetCount());
00109 
00110        return m_attributePtr->GetValueAt(index);
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 // protected methods
00115 
00116 template <typename Attribute>
00117 bool TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::InitInternal(
00118                      const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00119                      const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00120                      const IComponent** definitionComponentPtr)
00121 {
00122        Q_ASSERT(ownerPtr != NULL);
00123 
00124        const QByteArray& attributeId = staticInfo.GetAttributeId();
00125        const IComponentContext* componentContextPtr = ownerPtr->GetComponentContext();
00126        if (componentContextPtr != NULL){
00127               int definitionLevel = -1;
00128               const iser::IObject* attributePtr = componentContextPtr->GetAttribute(attributeId, &definitionLevel);
00129               m_attributePtr = dynamic_cast<const Attribute*>(attributePtr);
00130 
00131               if (m_attributePtr != NULL){
00132                      Q_ASSERT(definitionLevel >= 0);
00133 
00134                      if (definitionComponentPtr != NULL){
00135                             while (definitionLevel > 0){
00136                                    ownerPtr = ownerPtr->GetParentComponent();
00137                                    Q_ASSERT(ownerPtr != NULL);
00138 
00139                                    --definitionLevel;
00140                             }
00141 
00142                             *definitionComponentPtr = ownerPtr;
00143                      }
00144 
00145                      return true;
00146               }
00147        }
00148        else{
00149               m_attributePtr = NULL;
00150        }
00151 
00152        return false;
00153 }

00156 // other constructs used for special template for QString attribute
00157 
00158 template <typename Attribute>
00159 class TMultiAttributeMember: public TMultiAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>
00160 {
00161 };
00162 
00163 
00164 template <>
00165 class TMultiAttributeMember< TMultiAttribute<QString> >: public TMultiAttributeMemberBase< TMultiAttribute<QString> >
00166 {
00167 public:
00168        QString operator[](int index) const
00169        {
00170               return QCoreApplication::translate("Attribute", TMultiAttributeMemberBase< TMultiAttribute<QString> >::operator[](index).toLatin1());
00171        }
00172 };
